entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 11:06 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
